q2: Do you also like their current manager, Jose Mourinho?
q3: Do you think he can be as great as Sir Alex Ferguson?
a3: No, I think Mourinho will leave within 3 years.
q4: Do you think Mourinho is still “ the one “ ?
a4: I don't know about "the one" but I'm confident he'll take the team to good places.
q5: Yes, I think it will be this season
a5: He won't win the Champion's League
